description: Known benign mixin conflicts that should NOT trigger quarantines. These are mixin overwrite warnings where the mixin framework handles the conflict gracefully by skipping one of the mixins. The server continues running normally.

benign_conflicts.reason: Both mods override chunk random tick scheduling. The mixin framework skips the second one gracefully. No action needed.

benign_patterns.description: Any mixin overwrite that ends with 'Skipping method' is handled gracefully by the mixin framework

notes: Mixin overwrite warnings with 'Skipping method' are NOT crashes
The mixin framework handles these by using only one of the conflicting mixins
Only actual mixin errors (MixinApplyError, MixinTransformerError) require action
This file exists to document known conflicts for reference
